title: Team Red Knights - TRK // Clan Recruitment // Bronze+Silver
body:
Hey so I am ItsPhantomm aka Jarrad and I decided to start a team for ranked.
So lets get straight to the point.
I need pretty much every lane except support and I would love to have you! on my team.
We hope to enter online tournaments and win :D
Add me on league of legends if you are interested my username is ItsPhantomm
Just message me with your desired lane and what you can offer
**Thanks!**
**-Phantomm**

replies.body: yo hit me up in game

IGN: DUKE0 

Main: Jungle and Top

Champs: Jax, Gragas, Xin, Mundo

Heyyo, I can adc pretty well compared to most bronze players. Would like to know if I can join.
IGN - LetsTwitch
